description:
Course Description

Faster EFT is a combination of EFT (Emotional Freedom Technique), NLP (Neuro Linguistic Programming) and Hypnosis. It works with the sub-conscious mind to clear any limiting beliefs that are holding you back from living the life you deserve.

This course will teach you how to use this amazing cutting-edge technique to transform your life.

This course includes 8 video lectures, a power point presentation with audio, 2 bonus meditations, practical worksheets and diagrams to print off.

These are the amazing benefits of using Faster EFT:

* Can help you to de-stress and promote relaxation and a clear mind
* Will help you clear your fears, past hurts/traumas, anger, anxiety
* Can help you clear an addiction
* transform your life in a positive way
* transform your relationships with yourself and others
* Increase your self-esteem and confidence
* and many more

During this course, you will learn:

* All about the amazing Faster EFT technique and how it can help you
* How to use Faster EFT to clear your fears
* How to use Faster EFT to reduce/eliminate pain
* How to use Faster EFT to help children

Requirements of this course are:

* A desire to transform your life in a positive way
* A commitment to healing yourself

The Target Audience of this Course:

* This course is designed for the complete beginner to someone who has knowledge of holistic therapies.

* It is aimed at anyone wanting to better their lives and heal parts of themselves that need healing.
title: Eliminate Stress Now with FasterEFT (Hypnosis)
